channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT

item.title: Report X-2024031409
item.description:
Report X-2024031409

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-26
  • City: OREM
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AT THE UPS FACILITY IN OREM, UTAH, AN AIR PACKAGE WAS INSPECTED DUE TO THERMAL TRACKING LABEL BEING PARTIALLY TORN AND ILLEGIBLE WITH SIGNS OF PREVIOUS MARKS REMOVED. PACKAGE OPENED TO FIND NINE IPADS IN OTTER BOXES WITH CHARGING CORDS. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THERE IS A RED FRAGILE STICKER APPLIED. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.description:
Report X-2024031113

  • State: UT

  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: UNLOADED AND SENT OVERHEAD SORTER, DAMAGED OUTTER BOX CAUSING THE LID TO BECOME LOOSE AND LEAK CORROSIVE SOLID. PLACED INSIDE A HAZMAT BAG AND RED HAZMAT TOTE. DescribePack: LOOSE CAP CAUSED BY SENDING IT OVER HEAD SORTER DAMAGING THE OUTTER BOX SOILING ALL CONTENTS INSIDE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PLACED INSIDE A HAZMAT BAG AND RED HAZMAT TOTE.
